title: DE-1 Plasma Wave Instrument (PWI) Step Frequency Correlator (SFC) Electric and Magnetic Field Spectral Density - Donald Gurnett (University Iowa)

info.x_cadence_note: Cadence based on variable 'Epoch' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/de/de1/waves_pwi/sfc-spectra_cdaweb/1981/de1_pwi_sfc-spectra_19810916_v01.cdf. This most common cadence occurred for 95.4545% of the 1008 timesteps. Cadence = 32000000000 [ns] = PT32S.

parameters.name: Time
parameters.x_description: Event time for the start of the sweep

parameters.name: Ex_Spectra_Reorder
parameters.description: Spin Plane E-Field (SFC Ex) Spectra, 200 meter antenna, 104 Hz to 409 kHz [data monotonically sorted based on dependencies]. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function reorder_data (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['Ex_Spectra', 'Frequencies']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: Ex_Spectra
parameters.description: [CDAWEB PLOTS NOT SUPPORTED] Spin Plane E-Field (SFC Ex) Spectra, 200 meter antenna, 104 Hz to 409 kHz

bins.name: Frequencies
bins.description: ---> [CDAWEB PLOTS NOT SUPPORTED] Channel Frequency Centers (fixed), 512 (104.8 to 409610 Hz)

parameters.name: Ez_Spectra_Reorder
parameters.description: Spin Axis E-Field (SFC Ez) Spectra, 8 meter antenna, 104 Hz to 409 kHz [data monotonically sorted based on dependencies]. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function reorder_data (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['Ez_Spectra', 'Frequencies']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: Ez_Spectra
parameters.description: [CDAWEB PLOTS NOT SUPPORTED] Spin Axis E-Field (SFC Ez) Spectra, 8 meter antenna, 104 Hz to 409 kHz

bins.name: Frequencies
bins.description: ---> [CDAWEB PLOTS NOT SUPPORTED] Channel Frequency Centers (fixed), 512 (104.8 to 409610 Hz)

parameters.name: Es_Spectra_Reorder
parameters.description: Spin Plane E-Field (SFC Es) Spectra, 0.6 meter antenna, 104 Hz to 100 kHz [data monotonically sorted based on dependencies]. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function reorder_data (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['Es_Spectra', 'Frequencies']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: Es_Spectra
parameters.description: [CDAWEB PLOTS NOT SUPPORTED] Spin Plane E-Field (SFC Es) Spectra, 0.6 meter antenna, 104 Hz to 100 kHz

bins.name: Frequencies
bins.description: ---> [CDAWEB PLOTS NOT SUPPORTED] Channel Frequency Centers (fixed), 512 (104.8 to 409610 Hz)

parameters.name: B_Spectra_Reorder
parameters.description: Spin Plane B-Field (SFC B) Spectra, 1.0 m**2 loop antenna, 104 to 409 kHz [data monotonically sorted based on dependencies]. This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function reorder_data (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['B_Spectra', 'Frequencies']. Note that not all COMPONENTS are time series and so their values are not available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: B_Spectra
parameters.description: [CDAWEB PLOTS NOT SUPPORTED] Spin Plane B-Field (SFC B) Spectra, 1.0 m**2 loop antenna, 104 to 409 kHz

bins.name: Frequencies
bins.description: ---> [CDAWEB PLOTS NOT SUPPORTED] Channel Frequency Centers (fixed), 512 (104.8 to 409610 Hz)

parameters.name: Ex_Receivers
parameters.description: The SFR Receivers used to measure the Ex Antenna output (1=A,2=B,3=both)

parameters.name: Ez_Receivers
parameters.description: ---> The SFR Receivers used to measure the Ez Antenna output

parameters.description: ---> The SFR Receivers used to measure the Es Antenna output

parameters.name: B_Receivers
parameters.description: ---> The SFR Receivers used to measure the B Antenna output

parameters.name: Quality_Flag
parameters.description: Integer combining all data quality flags (0 = no issues detected)
